alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains; Camas Prairie; Owyhee Mountains; Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands; West Central Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 11 at 1:52PM MDT until April 12 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. In the West Central Mountains, Boise Mountains, and Owyhee Mountains, additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, except 4 to 10 inches over the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph in the Owyhees. In the Camas Prairie, additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches with winds gusting to 45 mph. In the Southwest Highlands and Southern Twin Falls County, additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, except 3 to 6 inches over the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Idaho. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Boise Mountains; Camas Prairie; Owyhee Mountains; Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands; West Central Mountains
